alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 3:05PM MST until January 06 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches. Wind gusts to 50 mph may produce areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs and Central Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Expect winter driving conditions including snow covered roads and greatly reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
